title: Ping problems?
body: So I have both a laptop and a computer. Obviously, I favor my computer but although I can play a custom with no ping problems on it, the moment I hit a PVP game or someone joins my custom, my ping hits 2000+ ping. And I have no clue why since my laptop runs the game just fine and has no problems with ping. Any solutions?

replies.body:
This could be caused by a bad network driver on your desktop (computer). I'd recommend visiting the manufacturer's support site to ensure all the latest drivers have been installed before ensuring all your network settings on your desktop have been configured to the same listed in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

Let me know if you observe any change in your latency.
